description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: gpac 2.3-DEV-rev921-g422b78ecf-master was discovered to contain a out of boundary write vulnerability via swf_get_string at scene_manager/swf_parse.c:325
Se descubrió que gpac 2.3-DEV-rev921-g422b78ecf-master contiene una vulnerabilidad de escritura fuera de los límites a través de swf_get_string en scene_manager/swf_parse.c:325
